name: Spaceship (Zolder)
description:
Spaceship is a simple space shooter game, where you have to avoid asteroids.

Over time, the speed of asteroids increases.

When you hit one, game over.

Simple.

The game uses a backup system based on a "data.txt" file (yes I was lazy to make a .json save system).

The game is powered by raylib

Controls

No mouse needed, even for the menu,

- directional arrows to move

- space to shoot
